Dubai.description: The most cosmopolitan city in the UAE, known for its futuristic skyline, luxury shopping, and world-class attractions.

major_attractions.name: Burj Khalifa
major_attractions.description: The world's tallest building with observation decks.

major_attractions.name: Dubai Mall
major_attractions.description: One of the world's largest shopping malls.

major_attractions.name: Palm Jumeirah
major_attractions.description: Man-made island shaped like a palm tree.

major_attractions.name: Dubai Fountain
major_attractions.description: The world's largest choreographed fountain system.

Abu Dhabi.description: The capital city of the UAE, known for its cultural attractions and grand mosque.

major_attractions.name: Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
major_attractions.description: One of the world's largest mosques.

cultural_tips.tip: Dress modestly in public areas. Cover shoulders and knees.
Show respect during prayer times and avoid eating in public during Ramadan.
A handshake is common. Wait for women to extend their hand first.
Avoid photographing people without permission, especially women.
Available in licensed venues. Public intoxication is illegal.
